feed.title: Kestra Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Kestra: v0.23.7
entry.content:
Changelog

üöÄ Features

flows - a8584a8 add setting to disable hovers in editor

üìò Subtasks

version - bc1a08b bump to version '0.23.7'

üêõ Bug Fixes

executions - 26a82fc support unicode file name inside the internal storage, closes #9550

logs - fccbb6b update query filter to show logs ns and flowwise (#10248), closes #10248

pebble - e264c0b #8953 add more flexible day number conversion method (#10205), closes #8953 #10205

tests - 45ad1f6 strengthen awaitExecution predicate

triggers - 8359bfc ensure clearing the selection. (#10245), closes #10245 - 5737216 only updates the trigger that matches both flowId and triggerId (#10156), closes #10156

global - 30a8081 handle label filter with and instead or for flow, closes #4390

  • a243c56 fix(namespaces)*: prevent overwriting namespace file content with undefined string
  • 5121ceb system: compilation issue
  • 1dae994 fix(executions)*: restart with finally or afterExecution, closes #10155

Contributors

We'd like to thank the following people for their contributions: Bart Ledoux, Florian Hussonnois, GitHub, Lo√Øc Mathieu, MilosPaunovic, Nicolas K., Piyush Bhaskar, Piyush-r-bhaskar, YannC., nKwiatkowski

entry.title: New release for Kestra: v0.21.19
entry.content:
Features

  • cicd: #4006 migrate sonatype to maven central (#9803) (Nicolas K.)
  • cicd: #4006 migrate to maven central (#9807) (Nicolas K.)
  • cicd: migrate to maven central (nKwiatkowski)

Bug Fixes

  • system: wait for grace period before reemitting tasks for terminated_forced workers (Florian Hussonnois)

Chores

  • version: update to version 'v0.21.19' (Florian Hussonnois)

entry.title: New release for Kestra: v0.22.21
entry.content:
Breaking Changes

  • core: amend misc label-related issues (#10044) (Lo√Øc Mathieu)

Bug Fixes

  • executions: race condition inside nested ForEach with concurrency (Lo√Øc Mathieu)
  • executions: flow concurrency limit not honors when executions are created at a high rate (Lo√Øc Mathieu)
  • core: amend misc label-related issues (#10044) (Lo√Øc Mathieu)
  • core: compilation issue (Lo√Øc Mathieu)
  • set postgres and mysql queue offset as a bigint (#10344) (YannC)
  • triggers: bulk action on triggers did not take into account this is async (#10307) (Roman Acevedo)
  • core: add translations (brian.mulier)
  • test: wrong URL in test (Lo√Øc Mathieu)
  • tests: wrong URL (Lo√Øc Mathieu)

Chores

  • version: version 0.22.21 (Lo√Øc Mathieu)

Commits

  • 890bb8f: Revert "fix(executions): flow concurrency limit not honors when executions are created at a high rate" (Lo√Øc Mathieu)

entry.title: New release for Kestra: v0.23.8
entry.content:
Changelog

üìò Subtasks

flows - 8355eb1 show small execution charts on flow listing

version - ffa33b1 version 0.23.8

üêõ Bug Fixes

cli - ae14d98 #10062 add tenant to load flows properly at the startup (#10290), closes #10062 #10290

core - af9129f compilation issue - 177ba35 üö® amend misc label-related issues (#10044) - *switched from first to last label value override BREAKING CHANGE: preventing empty key/value labels BREAKING CHANGE: preventing whitespace in key

  • fix(core): reflect feedback

  • Deduplicated a list inside the Labels task.

  • Worked around label mutation at Worker.

  • Attempted to deduplicate labels within Execution as possible.

  • fix(core): remove irrelevant changes*, closes #10044

  • ccd7b43 fix search filtering based on endDate field (kestra-io/kestra-ee#4446)
  • 50f72f8 check null uri (#10309), closes #10309

executions - 162764f flow concurrency limit not honors when executions are created at a high rate, closes #10167 - 53f881e race condition inside nested ForEach with concurrency, closes #10167 - 0759aae update query parameter for state filtering (#10315), closes #10315 - fc8b389 make sure outputs do not overflow over right drawer (#10238), closes #10232 #10238

namespaces - 5585e9d make sure the namespace parameter is properly passed when reading a file (#10384), closes #10363 #10384

system - b99946d avoid potential NPE in ServiceLivenessManager (#10338), closes #10338 - 19428ad ignore state transition failure for indexer

triggers - a5b4ec3 bulk action on triggers did not take into account this is async (#10307), closes #10307

global - f8cb335 set postgres and mysql queue offset as a bigint (#10344), closes #10344

Contributors

We'd like to thank the following people for their contributions: Bart Ledoux, Florian Hussonnois, Lo√Øc Mathieu, MilosPaunovic, Milo≈° Paunoviƒá, Nicolas K., Piyush Bhaskar, Piyush-r-bhaskar, Roman Acevedo, YannC, YannC., nKwiatkowski, yuri

entry.title: New release for Kestra: v0.23.9
entry.content:
Changelog

üìò Subtasks

core - 7f355dd localize to languages other than english (#10405), closes #10405

version - a945780 upgrade to version 0.23.9

üêõ Bug Fixes

cli - d512f86 tenantService was injected directly, this is not working in cli

Contributors

We'd like to thank the following people for their contributions: GitHub Action, Lo√Øc Mathieu, MilosPaunovic, Roman Acevedo, github-actions[bot], nKwiatkowski
